name: West Virginia Educational Encouragement Program (WVEEP)
description: Pays 100% of tuition and fees up to $9,000 per fiscal year for West Virginia National Guard members attending participating WV institutions. Can be used IN ADDITION to federal tuition assistance. Funds only for tuition and allowable fees - no overpayments or refunds.
eligibility: Enrolled in approved, accredited post-secondary institution in WV
Not under adverse action or administrative flag when applying
benefit_amount: 100% tuition + fees (up to $9,000/fiscal year) + federal TA
how_to_apply: Apply through West Virginia National Guard Education Office

name: West Virginia Veterans Re-education Assistance
description: Up to $500 per semester for veterans for tuition assistance, tests for professional license or certification, and other training materials. For veterans who have exhausted GI Bill benefits.
eligibility: Pursuing education, professional license, or training
how_to_apply: Apply through West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance
source_name: West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance

name: Children of KIA/Service Death FREE Tuition
description: Children (ages 16-23) whose parent died on active duty during wartime OR as result of disability/injury during wartime duty receive FREE tuition at West Virginia state colleges. Child must be between 16-23 years old.
eligibility: Parent died on active duty during wartime OR from wartime service disability/injury
Parent was WV resident at time of military entry
how_to_apply: Apply through West Virginia Higher Education Policy Commission
source_name: West Virginia Higher Education Policy Commission

name: In-State Tuition for Veterans
description: West Virginia public colleges and universities offer in-state tuition rates to all veterans regardless of state residency under Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act.
how_to_apply: Submit DD-214 to West Virginia institution
source_name: West Virginia Higher Education Policy Commission

name: Disabled Veteran Real Property Tax Credit (NEW 2024)
description: NEW 2024 legislation! Honorably discharged veterans with 90-100% Combined Disability Rating can claim tax CREDIT equal to property tax paid. Applied to state income tax; if exceeds tax owed OR don't file state taxes, can claim reimbursement. Property taxes must be paid on time (Oct 1 & Apr 1). REPLACES previous $20,000 homestead exemption. Only applies to primary residence (exclusive residential use).
eligibility: Eligible starting January 1, 2024 (first use: 2024 return filed in 2025)
benefit_amount: Tax credit = full property tax amount paid (or reimbursement if no tax liability)
how_to_apply: Claim on West Virginia state income tax return starting 2024 tax year

name: 100% P&T Property Tax Exemption (Legacy)
description: Veterans rated 100% permanent and totally disabled by VA may be exempt from certain property taxes. Note: This is being replaced by NEW 2024 tax credit for 90-100% disabled veterans.
how_to_apply: Contact local County Assessor; being transitioned to new 2024 credit system

name: Military Pay Income Tax Exemption
description: Military pay received by West Virginia resident service members is exempt from WV income tax IF: (1) On active duty 30+ days AND permanently separate with DD214, OR (2) Guard/Reserve called to federal active duty for Operation Enduring Freedom or domestic security. Includes exemption for year of discharge.
eligibility: Active duty 30+ days with permanent separation OR Guard/Reserve federal activation
Home of Record is West Virginia
benefit_amount: 100% exemption on military pay (including discharge year)
how_to_apply: Exclude from West Virginia income tax return

name: Military Retirement Pay Tax Exemption (Effective 2018)
description: For tax years beginning after December 31, 2017: Military retirement income is 100% EXEMPT from West Virginia state income tax. Includes regular Armed Forces, Reserves, and National Guard retirement paid by U.S. or State of WV. Also includes survivorship annuities to extent included in federal AGI.
eligibility: Receiving military retirement pay OR survivorship annuity
benefit_amount: 100% exemption on military retirement + survivorship annuities
how_to_apply: Exclude from West Virginia income tax return

name: Afghanistan War Veteran Cash Bonus
description: One-time cash bonus for veterans who served during War in Afghanistan: $600 for service in combat zone OR $400 for service outside combat zone. Active-duty service members can apply. Must apply within 1 year of leaving active duty with honorable discharge.
eligibility: West Virginia resident OR active duty
Apply within 1 year of leaving active duty
how_to_apply: Contact West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance
source_name: West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance

name: Veterans Employment Preference Points
description: All wartime veterans with honorable discharge get 5 points added to final state employment test score. Veterans with Purple Heart OR VA disability get ADDITIONAL 5 points (total 10). Includes Guard/Reserve with qualifying service.
eligibility: OR Purple Heart/VA disability veteran (+5 more = 10 total)
benefit_amount: 5 or 10 preference points on state employment exams
how_to_apply: Indicate veteran status on state employment applications with DD-214

name: West Virginia Military Incentive Tax Credit (Employers)
description: Tax credits for businesses employing economically disadvantaged veterans, disabled veterans, and unemployed WV National Guard/Reserve members. Economically disadvantaged veterans: 30% of first $5,000 wages. Disabled veterans: disability % Ã— first $5,000 wages. Guard/Reserve: 25% of first $5,000 wages. Encourages private sector veteran employment.
eligibility: Veteran certified by WV Division of Employment Security
Cannot displace existing employee or receive other job training payments
benefit_amount: 25-30% of first $5,000 wages (or disability % for disabled vets)
how_to_apply: Employer contacts WorkForce West Virginia for certification

name: WorkForce West Virginia Veteran Services
description: Veteran employment services including resume writing, job interview skills development, and training opportunities. Dedicated support for veteran job placement.
benefit_amount: Free employment services and career assistance

name: FREE Hunting, Trapping, and Fishing (100% Disabled/POW/VA Auto Grant)
description: Resident veterans who qualify for federal VA auto grant benefits, have 100% permanent and total disability, OR were POW receive FREE West Virginia hunting, trapping, and fishing licenses.
eligibility: 100% permanent and total VA disability OR POW OR VA auto grant recipient
how_to_apply: Apply through West Virginia Division of Natural Resources with VA documentation
source_name: West Virginia Division of Natural Resources

name: FREE Hunting/Fishing/Trapping on Leave
description: Active duty service members on leave or furlough permitted to hunt, fish, and trap WITHOUT LICENSE while on leave.
eligibility: On authorized leave or furlough in West Virginia
benefit_amount: FREE hunting + fishing + trapping (no license needed on leave)
how_to_apply: Present military ID and leave papers
source_name: West Virginia Division of Natural Resources

name: FREE Lifetime State Park Pass (100% Disabled)
description: Veterans with 100% service-connected disability receive FREE lifetime pass to all West Virginia State Parks including camping and day-use facilities.
benefit_amount: FREE lifetime pass (all state parks, camping, day-use)
how_to_apply: Apply through West Virginia State Parks with VA documentation

name: FREE Special License Plates
description: Special vehicle license plates and disabled veteran tags provided WITHOUT FEE to: veterans qualifying for federal VA auto grant benefits, 100% permanent and total disability, former POWs, Purple Heart recipients, Pearl Harbor survivors. Other veteran plates available for $10 one-time fee.
eligibility: West Virginia veteran meeting specific criteria
FREE for: VA auto grant, 100% P&T, POW, Purple Heart, Pearl Harbor
$10 fee for other honorably discharged veterans
benefit_amount: FREE special plates (qualifying vets) or $10 one-time fee
how_to_apply: Apply at West Virginia DMV with qualifying documentation
source_name: West Virginia Division of Motor Vehicles

name: West Virginia Veterans Home
description: Located in Barboursville. Offers residential and nursing care to eligible veterans - housing, meals, medical care, and social activities.
eligibility: Eligible for residential or nursing care
how_to_apply: Contact West Virginia Veterans Home in Barboursville
source_name: West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance
